text: Cécile Reims (19 October 1927 – 18 July 2020) was a French engraver and writer.La Châtre : Cécile Reims, ancienne résistante et graveuse de renom, est morte à 92 ans She was a resistance member of World War II. She received the Legion of Honour in 2013. Reims was born in Paris. Reims died in La Châtre on 18 July 2020, aged 92. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Writers from Paris
title: Cécile Reims
